Blog.post: urlLink I took this picture in Bali, one of the monkeyrainforests..

Yesterday night,I went home after watching the movie 'Connie and Carla'. Was reallya funny show cos mostly gays. lol, then went to geylang and eat some durians. On the way back,I saw some postitutes. They are really very pretty.Today morning after tea, my parents and I went paying visitto both mypast away grandparents. Then now I'm home and later have to go for muaythai class at 5pm. The whole daywas so packed, don'thave much time for myself.My classmate, kelvin introduce'outpost' this game to me. Wondering whether its nice or not cos I'm downloadin now. So bored and looking at my younger bro playing his toys in front of me. Those superheroes flying here and there, cars crashing and the sound 'bish,bash, ahhhh..' so loud. Then the bad guy dies and reborn again. Sounds so stupid but quitecute. hahahaha ...

Same as before, homework not done yet. I laughed like hell in mother tongue lesson today. wahahaha, Li kept making jokes and laughin non-stop. Then they took my pencil case and acting saying they didn't take. After 1 big round, they returned me.I cancelled my tuition cos I'm very tired.I came back from school around 4.30pm, finished snooker training. Then tomorrowI have N level MT oral. Sounds very fearful but I'm not. Eventually, it's quite easy anyway. My friend, Fiona is always behind me when it comes to oral. Haha, think of it also funny. Today she brought chewing gum for us, so nice of you. But I won't thank you. lolz! So boring, think I gonna have my dinner. Its so late to have my dinner...

Yesterday, I came back from muaythai training. Mythighs and armswas hurtso I didn't go to school today. Homework also not done yet. Hehe. I got boxedtwice on the left eye and stomach while sparring with my trainer.Later on, Isparred with my best friend Li and I felt guilty cos I accidently hit him quite hard onhis eye. Then we went to take the MRT at 11.15pm at chinese garden and it was 1 hr journey back home. So tiring when I reach Tampines and there was no bus. So I walked home with a cig on. Think I gonna have my lunch now, hungary... bRb~

I had my chinese oral today. Average difficulty. But quite fun having oral becos that makes me l nervous and excited, lol. later then still have tuition, so boring. Teachers are giving so much work on these days, everyday there's work. Hardly breathe. Worried I will be tired and sleepy soI think I'mgonna go and watch some mtv and have some sleep. Seeya ..

Today Iwoke up quite early suddenly I saw alot of people whomI donno in my house. Later I found outmy mum is oragnising a party without letting me know. Maybe yesterday I didn see her then she forgot to tell me. As my hair had reduce to botak, I don dare to mingle withem`. I brought my laptop upstairs my room and use it. It was quite noisy in the morning, wondering whymy mum invite them in the morning. I'm in my room alone doing nothing and facing3 walls. Noone call talk tome, sister sleepin and brother went for tuition classes. ThinkI'm gonna do something to keep myself busy. Gotta go, seeya~ I still have Muaythai lessons later on.. on on...

I hadmy head shaved tobotak againand now allmy friends said I look like a monk ( aka army boy ). Haha, actually I also like my hairstyle now as its very cooling. Just came back from playing snooker at safra with Terry.My homework all were notfinish yet.Kinda boring now and damn it, tmr have tuition. I haven finish thework also.*sigh.

I just recover from sore eyes, wondering why I always having sore eyes.So tiring and the whole house is so quiet. My sister just came back and everyone is slping. My dad had gone overseas and leaving me alone. haha, no choice but have to study. Exams are around the corner, have to work extra hard on weak subjects. but it seems no effect on it. Its so late now and quiet yet I'm blasting music on my headphone. Once I turn onthe speakers, I will see my mum running down the stairs and scold me. Hmm, so boring. I gotta go for somesmoke, cyA..
urlLink urlLink I took this picture on 15/7/04 around 10+ in the nightthats why you can see the background is dark.
urlLink urlLink I find this picture quite funny and weird. confused, haha...
urlLink urlLink Few weeks had this picture taken at coffee club express (orchard).

Today was a very terrible day for me in class as I kept on falling asleep. I forgotten to do my POA homework and was punished by standing outside the class. But I found a way to keep myself cool and relaxing, so i sat on the ground.A bunch oflower sec pupils passed by and looked at me differently. Just wondering is there anything wrong with me? And after school, we went to look forMiss Zhang with my friends, roger and anli and therest of the girls. Her last day in school today and a girl even cried for her. So touching scene. Heard she's going for her further studies and that's a great news. Opps, I going out for snooker soon..seeya

today chemistry paper is so difficult. prehafs i jus study abit so i said so. very afraid to fail my prelims, if fail, i die. yesterday english paper i also don understand. haiz, very boring. tomorrow having physics and history. think i gonna study already..

jus now i went gym with my best friends; kwangnam, siling and yilin. did alittle bit then tired le.. after 1.5hrs inside the gym, we went to mac to have some food as siling is complaining hungary. the new injuries on my shins have not recover yet, shit man. think next time must kick banana tree already. i'm so restless now.. better get some sleep.. later i have to revise my work. prelim is on next week.. so scary~ see ya

yesterday i went tampines mall with my aunt, younger brother and my maid. actually we went there to buy groceries. then i went up the cd shop 'MJ' and saw some nice soft listening cds. bought music from 'hitomi shimatari - best collection', 'tim janis - beautiful america', 'suzanne ciani - pure romance' and lastly 'the best musicals in the world ever' and it cost a hundred bucks. so expensive! then i bought a black singlet too. haha, look nice in me too. so later i'm going to esplanade to view fireworks with my friends and maybe chilling after that. such a long holiday til tuesday, can slack til siao.

2days ago, i went to watch the movie 'the notebook' with anli and roger. it was a touching story but somehow anli and i laughed in the back part of the movie, saying all those stupid jokes. after that, we went aimly around tampines mall and mrt station. everywhere was close becos its 12.30am. no where else to go so we decided to go home.

t omorrow is national celebration. have to go back to school and sing songs and my class is singing 'home'. rahu is doing the breakdance and he taught me in class today late morning. however, it really has some difficulty. both my shins were injured becos i whacked on 4 bamboo sticks ytd. have to train my shins hard. i'm worry that my shins will break when i fight muaythai. finally, social studies and chinese prelim is over but i think i will fail. now, can rest awhile more then there's gonna exams in 2 weeks time. got to study more already..
